t: Kindle Direct Publishing - Wikipedia
s: 5 days ago - Originally called Digital Text Platform, the platform allows authors and publishers to publish their books to the Amazon Kindle Store. Authors can upload documents in several formats for delivery via the KDP website and charge between $0.99 and $200.00 for their works.
